a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: MDG1.C: Share of population undernourished, 1991 to 2015
Millennium Development Goal 1.C (MDG1.C) was to halve the share of people in developing regions defined as
undernourished (hungry) between 1990 and 2015. This Target was narrowly missed.

text.textPath: Target: halve the share of people (to 11.5%) undernourished
Target: halve the share of people (to 11.5%) undernourished

text.tspan: Data source: MDG Final Evaluation (UN MDG Report)
